params.baseSize: The base font size in the scale
params.ratio: The scaling ratio (stored as fixed-point, e.g. 1250 = 1.250)
params.steps: The number of steps in the scale

params.typography: The typography ID to look up

defineFontStack(bytes32,string,string,st.notice: defineFontStack - registers a named font stack for a typography

defineScale(bytes32,uint256,uint256,int2.notice: defineScale - creates or updates a typography scale

defineStyle(bytes32,string,string).notice: defineStyle - defines a named text style for a typography

getFontStack(bytes32,string).notice: Get a font stack by typography ID and name

getStyle(bytes32,string).notice: Get a text style by typography ID and name
